name: Media Glint
description:
Media Glint's mission is simple: provide clients with a direct and transparent approach to IT solutions. Our direct approach seeks to provide clients with a clear understanding of our process. From start to finish, we want our process to be as transparent as possible so clients know where the project stands.
Media Glint maintains its mission by focusing on Processes and Personnel. Exceptional Processes and Personnel are essential to providing unparalleled service.
